TopicTitle: KSP Forum Guns of Icarus Group

Articles.Content:
Hey guys, if you are a fan of the game Guns of Icarus Online, you may know that its difficult to get a game with a team that all communicates and works together, so, i though id make it a bit easier by creating a group for people who are really looking for some good people to play the game with. i figured i could make a steam group and gather up some gunner, engineers, and pilots, and occasionally run some games, if you're interested in joining, just say so below and join my steam group. http://steamcommunity.com/groups/KSPGOI

Members

Shoveycat

Astrobug

Fox62

MGUARN

WhiteWeasel

Edited August 7, 2013 by shoveycat

Well, I can't say I'm particularly skilled at the game, but I am a bit of a steampunk nerd. I would certainly be up for a good game now-and-again.

Edited August 7, 2013 by Astrobug
No problem, im not good either, but a group of incompetents can accomplish great things, usually, sometimes, okay, im lying
I might consider joining, but I'm reasonably unlikely to be on at any one point in time.

I Very skilled somewhat being an engi at hammering ,and a somewhat good at fire the guns.I really suck at flying ships ,but i have improved a bit. Im "The Derpy Gamer" with out the quotations on steam ,and i believe the same in the game.
Who needs guns? I'm good at smashing ships.
I'm a good all rounder at everything except piloting, I suppose. jx79123 on steam, Verschev Yeltsovich on GoI.

I'd join...but I don't have the game or the cash to get it.

(Unless it randomly became free)

I'm hoping to schedule a game once we get a few more people, you can probably expect a game going on around 9 or 10 PM EST one of these days, assuming we have 10, maybe 20 people (I'm probably overestimating severely...)

Edited August 7, 2013 by shoveycat
